1.content:
In every scenario the protagonist is immensely wealthy by means fitting to the scenario.

1. Jill, the slim and lazy estranged 18 year old daughter of recently deceased multi millionaire business owners. Jill didn't know her parents well. Jill attends high school as a senior. Sexual orientation: Gay.

2. Rachel, 21 year old app developer. Rachel was an orphan and has grown up struggling, her attitude is what made the fortune she possesses. Sexual orientation: Bisexual

3. Mica, the worlds first 19 year old billionaire. Sexual orientation: gay

4. Willow, 18 year old daughter of a lonely widower who recently won the lottery.

5. Something else

11.content:
Jill, is a slim and lazy 18 year old girl. She is 5'4". She is the only daughter heir to the recently deceased multi millionaire Oddstone family. Her parents owned an engineering company, which they have left for her along with the entirety of their assets and patents, she will never have to worry about money again. Jill attends high school and has always wished she didn't have to, sadly her parents forced her to go with the threat of taking away her allowance.

Now that she had free reign over the family fortune nothing can satisfy her lust for laziness. Jill will do everything in her power to ensure she is satisfied in every way.

As Jill struggles to put the sports bra on, it pushes her DD cup breasts up towards her chin and is overflowing the top band heavily. Jill then struggles to pull the silky spandex shorts up past her knees... "Damn, I really have grown since freshmen year." Jill said to herself. After a bit of struggle and shimmying Jill was finally able to pull it up to just under her colossal ass.

"Okay, you got this Jill. Just one big tug. One... Two ... Three!" and Jill jumps and tugs with all her might to get the extremely small shorts over her ass. A little bit of cheek is poking out of the middle of the top, and the bottom of her butt is almost showing. Jill attempts to tug at the spandex to correct it, but there was no give to any of it. The shorts were too tight to remove, she was sure of it. She was also sure the shorts were riding up her butt crack quite visibly.

"Alright, Jill, you're going to have to figure yourself a way out of these shorts later..." she trails off as she starts heading for the car.

Where is Jill doing?

choices: Jill invites Emily to her house with ulterior motives
112.content: Jill loved the idea of feeding her girlfriend Emily, it would be heaven to watch her girlfriend blow up like a balloon with all the food she can now buy. To Jill, it doesn't matter if Emily consents or not...
112.title: She can now feed her girlfriend in peace

1122.content:
Jill is sitting alone in her enormous kitchen when a light goes off in her head. Jill looks around and notices that the kitchen is completely stocked. Her parents were going to throw a party for the fourth of July next week and had bought more than enough for their hundred guests. A grin creeps on Jill's face as the idea gestates in her mind. Emily has always been an athletic girl, standing at 5'2" and weighing 125 pounds it was not hard to keep her figure, at least for now...



...



Jill invites Emily to her house with the ploy of helping her cope with the recent departure of her parents, but only Jill knew what was truly going to happen this evening, and perhaps maybe the next few days. About an hour passes and there's a knock on the door, Jill puts on her best sad face as she opens the door only to be greeted with a giant bear hug by her girlfriend, https://imgur.com/gallery/gNpRU3K.0

"Hey Jill! I'm so-so-so-so-sorry for what happened! I can't imagine what you're going through right now!"

"It's okay," Jill sniffles, "it really is okay. I'll be okay. I have you."

The two embrace with a small kiss as they continue to bury their faces in each others shoulders and head to the living room. They continue to talk, Jill plotting Emily's future curves and Emily none the wiser. Jill continues to check her phone, wondering when one of her surprises will arrive...
1122.title: Jill invites Emily to her house (ulterior motives)

choices: "No way Jill, I can't eat that much pizza"
11221.content:
The doorbell rings and Jill leaves the couch and safety of her girlfriend to answer it. When the door opens she is greeted by a middle aged delivery driver.

"That'll be 105.62."

"Okay, here's $200 if you put them on the coffee table in the living room." and with that Jill lead the delivery to her living room to where Emily looked on with a confused look. As soon as the driver left Emily asked, "Why so many pizza's?"

"Oh I'm so sorry! I must have accidentally added a 0 when I ordered them online... I haven't been myself recently." She lied, only Jill knew that she ordered 10 pizza's now, and 10 pizza's in 2 hours.

"I'm such a klutz, I feel so bad that this pizza would go to waste."

"We could always throw a party babe!" Emily perked up, trying to cheer her up.

"No, I'm not ready for that much human interaction. We might have to finish them ourselves. Besides, it's not like you wouldn't be able to burn off your extra calories, and I'll tone it out eventually.
11221.title: Jill ordered 10 pizza's

"No way Jill, I can't eat that much pizza!" Emily exclaimed. Jill wasn't to be deterred.

"But babe! You know how much I hate waste!" said Jill, planning her next move.

"Ok. I'll eat as much as I can, but only if you eat with me. I don't want to become a balloon."

Little did Emily know, that was the plan.

The two begin eating their pizza with careful anticipation, each eating a slice and drinking some soda to wash it down then continuing their conversation for a few minutes before they continue their conversation. After they each finished two whole pies Jill couldn't continue, and seemingly so couldn't Emily. Emily's tight jeans were now straining to hold their button and her shirt is now ridding up quite a bit.

After a few minutes of groaning between breaths Jill spoke up, "babe I can't continue, you have to finish these."

"No, what? No way! I can't finish 6 whole pizza's after eating 2 babe." Emily whined.

That's okay baby," Jill smirked with her plan coming to fruition, "we'll save some for later."

Only minutes pass and...

Jill returns with a pair of handcuffs and behind her back a funnel. She lays them down out of sight of Emily and walks to the kitchen to grab a chair and carries it back to the living room.

"Okay Em, hop on!" Jill commands her girlfriend.

"Ugh, give me a second." Emily grunts as she heaves her stuffed body up and into the chair, a laborious task for the poor girl. As soon as Emily sits down she finds herself handcuffed behind the back of the chair. "Oh, I see you want to focus on me then?" Emily asks playfully, unaware of the exact nature of what is about to occur...
11221122.title: Handcuffs and a funnel...

112211222.content:
Jill gets right to stuffing Emily, she began shoveling pizza into her mouth. Emily's eyes grew wide, she struggled to shout but couldn't - Jill was stuffing pizza into Emily's mouth faster than she could chew, and ended up swallowing most of the slices whole. Emily struggled against her constraints to no avail, she was stuck being fed by her crazed girlfriend.

Minutes of fast paced intense pizza stuffing, Jill had finished stuffing all the rest of the pizza's into her tiny girlfriend, her stomach stuck out like a woman 6 months pregnant with twins, she was hunched over her boulder of a belly and breathing heavy. Her belly was absolutely overstuffed, her previously flat stomach was now an overstretched food balloon. She had quite a few stretch marks on her throbbing red globe.

Emily slowly speaks up, "Babe... What the hell?"

"Oh, no back talk today. I'll make sure I make it up to you later, but no back talk. You just earned yourself some special treatment."

"No, nonononono Jill babe, what do you *hick* mean?"

"Oh, well you see on of my new subsidiary companies works with products, or hormones, for cattle. What it does is allows the injected cattle to rapidly process calories for a short time, the hormones also change the metabolism to displace fat in undesirable areas, in the case of cattle this means they have over extended and bloated looking guts - meaning more meat. So, babe! We're testing it out on you!"

Emily's mouth was agape and she started sobbing a bit, "Why me?"

"Because you're the most beautiful person I know, and now I'm making you my personal bloated bombshell!"

"What if I don't want to be your 'bloated bombshell'?"

"I'm sure you'll come to your senses."

Emily was about to protest but felt the needle in her arm, and instantly felt a calming wave fall over her.

11521.content:
Fast forward to Monday, and Jill is sitting in the office pouring over applications sent in for her "lifetime study", promising hundreds of dollars a day to the people she chooses for the position. After throwing away a stack of male applicants, Jill started calling the applicants that were her peers, many of them she recognized from highschool, many of them Jill had crushed om before they had graduated.

There is Rachel, she is 5'3" 120 pounds and shes relatively flat all over, however she did occasionally support a pot belly after lunch in highschool, this girl was skinny but she sure could eat. She graduated with honors, and you'd have to be smart to trick her.

There is Debbie, she is 5'7" 230 pounds and shes extremely top heavy, shes got a nice ass but its relatively small compared to her beer belly and E cup breasts. She seems to always be snacking. She failed every class but signed herself out of highschool at 18. She will be easy to trick.

There is short Sarah, as everyone called her. She is 4'5" and stopped growing when she was 12. She weighs 90 pounds, and is incredibly petite. She graduated with c's, she is not the brightest and you can trick her semi easily.

Who do you call to sign their soul and bodies over to you, for "science"?
11521.title: fast forward to next monday (job applicants)

115213.content:
You call Sarah into the office and ask if she can come today. She replies that she is in the neighborhood, but she isn't prepared today, you assure her that it is okay, because you knew her in high school.

Sarah arrives 35 minutes later in short jean shorts and a band tee shirt, you give her a short formal interview and hire her aboard! Its not like you wouldn't have "hired" her anyway.

You lay out the contract in front of Sarah and you tell her, "So if you sign here, you accept that you will live in this facility and you'll be subject to mild experiments whenever I deem necessary, obviously you can leave at any time and use any of the money you'd get" a lie. "What do you say?"

Sarah paused for a moment before speaking up, "I say this sounds great! Sign me up!" and she signs the contract without reading it.

"Okay Sarah, your first day starts tomorrow so come by at 8AM. You might also be traveling around the world business for me for business" another lie, "so bring whatever will make you feel at home and a lot of spare clothes"

The next day Sarah shows up in a pair of yoga pants and plain white tee shirt, upon arrival...

1152132.content:
When Sarah awakes, she finds herself strapped to a giant bed (she looks tiny compared to it). Her hands are bound to the posts, and her legs are strapped off the bed, and her mouth is fitted with a hose of some sort, and she feels something weird in her nose. Sarah struggles and tries to scream but is muffled but the hose in her mouth. After several minutes of struggling she exhausts herself and starts breathing heavy through her nose. Just then Jill walks in.

"Ah hello, Short Sarah. I know you always wanted to a bigger person" Jill gestures her hands above her head "but now, you will be a 'bigger' person" she gestures her hands around her abdomen as if rubbing a ball.

Sarah attempts to scream again, but is stopped by her tiredness.

Jill starts walking towards a machine at the other end of the room while proclaiming, "You see, your belly is extremely small right now. And I want to make it bigger really fast. I mean, REALLY fast. So I had my guys whip me up some special calorie dense nutrient paste that contains gel that heals wounds and boosts health when ingested, so I'll be feeding you until you almost burst, then wait a little bit and do it again. And then after a little while, I'll be able to continuously pump you full of of this paste until your belly is too big for this room and I have to move you to my warehouse. The best part is the nutrient paste and the health benefits will only make your belly grow fat. Anyway, enough monologue from me. As in, you wont hear from me again. You'll see from time to time, but" she turns the machine on, "I don't talk to pigs"

The machine starts humming, and Jill leaves the room. Sarah has tears in her eyes as she watches her stomach slowly expand out. She felt heavier and heavier every moment and she started to cry harder as her stomach felt over capacity, then the machine stopped. Her stomach is sticking 8 or so inches in front of her rib cage now, she feels so incredibly full. She is in so much pain, she is wincing and crying at the throbbing red bump that was once her flat belly.

A few moments of trying to calm down later and a robotic voice is heard, "Start weight: 90. End weight: 98. Next phase in 3, 2, 1..." and then the hose started flowing again. This time it lasted longer than before. Her stomach felt worse than before, starting to throb harder and harder, she was surely at her capacity a long time ago, but that gel must be helping her to stretch her stomach without popping. With sharper pains than before, the machine finally stopped pumping. Sarahs belly now sat a foot and a half in front of her, glossy and round like a globe.

A few moments pass and the machine speaks up again, "Start weight: 98. End weight: 115"

Sarah started sobbing as her harsh reality set in.
